org.drip.function.rdtor1

Class AffineMultivariate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.function.definition.RdToR1
      • org.drip.function.rdtor1.AffineMultivariate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConvexMultivariate

    public class AffineMultivariate
extends RdToR1
implements ConvexMultivariate
    AffineMultivariate implements a Planar Linear R^d To R^1 Function using a Multivariate Vector.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
